Title: Relation to the regulation of the use of artificial intelligence and facial recognition technology in criminal investigations
Summary: Requires the division of criminal justice services to formulate a protocol for the regulation of the use of artificial intelligence and facial recognition technology in criminal investigations; restricts the use of artificial intelligence-generated outputs in court.
LawCode: Amd ยง837, Exec L; add ยง60.77, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the regulation of the use of artificial intelligence and facial recognition technology in criminal investigations; and to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to limiting the use of artificial intelligence-generated outputs in court
